about_the_game:
A journey of martial arts mastery and challenge. Immerse yourself in a thrilling storyline that follows your rise to power as a martial arts master and engage in intense battles against powerful enemies.
In Fist of the Stray Dog, you'll step into the shoes of a skilled martial artist and fight your way through the ranks to become the ultimate master. Use lightning-fast reflexes, precise strikes, and devastating combos to defeat your foes and climb to the top of the martial arts world.

With a focus on immersive VR gameplay, Fist of the Stray Dog offers an unparalleled level of realism and excitement. Whether you're a seasoned martial artist or a newcomer to the world of fighting, Fist of the Stray Dog is the perfect game for you.

In the story mode, you'll follow a narrative that chronicles your journey from a novice fighter to a true master of the martial arts. Hone your skills, learn new fighting styles, and unlock new enemies to fight as you progress through the game.
Challenge yourself in the high score mode, where you'll face increasingly difficult opponents and strive to achieve the highest score possible.

With stunning graphics, realistic sound effects, and immersive gameplay, Fist of the Stray Dog is the ultimate VR beat 'em up experience. So what are you waiting for? Strap on your VR headset and become the master of martial arts.

Room scale is required with a minimum supported play area size of 2m by 2m (6.5ft by 6.5ft). Please ensure your SteamVR Chaperone boundaries or Oculus Guardian boundaries are set up properly for room scale and that you are willing to move and punch anywhere within and around the play area you have defined. Joystick movement is not supported, and you are expected to physically move around in the real world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD Ryzen 5 1600 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • VR Support: SteamVR . Requires motion controllers. Room Scale 2m by 2m (6.5ft by 6.5ft) area required. Joystick movement not supported.

short_description: Enter the ultimate virtual reality beat 'em up and test your martial arts skills in Fist of the Stray Dog. Experience the thrill of a dynamic combat system! Engage in intense battles against challenging opponents, using precise strikes and combos to defeat them.
